info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 12:38PM CDT until March 22 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL HINDS AND COPIAH COUNTIES... At 1237 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Carpenter to Allen, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Dentville around 1245 PM CDT. Glancy around 1250 PM CDT. Hazlehurst and Martinsville around 1255 PM CDT. Terry and Gallman around 100 PM CDT. Rockport and Hopewell around 110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Beauregard and Georgetown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
